name: Finnair Flight Academy
about: Finnair Flight Academy, a subsidiary of Finnair, is based at Helsinki Airport and offers comprehensive pilot training. The academy employs 100 simulator instructors and 30 safety & service trainers, providing EASA Part 147 approved training. Facilities include fire simulators, evacuation training, door trainers, and full flight simulators for A320, A330, A350, and ERJ-170 aircraft. Training programs range from entry-level to instructor training, including type rating courses and cross-crew qualifications. The academy is open 24 hours a day, year-round, and is conveniently located near hotels and other amenities. With a focus on expertise and comfort, Finnair Flight Academy supports pilots in developing their skills and advancing their careers.
services:
["Airbus Entry-Level Training
Type Rating courses
Cross-Crew Qualification Courses
Type Refresher Training
Commander training
Second-in-command Training
Instructor Training
Recurrent Training
Service training"]
